DOC.brief_summary: Laparoscopic cholecystectomy accept gold standard management cholelithiasis . Although laparoscopic procedure many advantage , intra-abdominal CO2 insufflation cause decrease lung volume compliance , increase airway resistance impair ventilation-perfusion ratio . In study , investigator aim investigate effect intra-operative PEEP treatment 3 distinct level respiratory dynamic elimination time volatile anesthetic agent .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Effects PEEP Levels Respiratory Mechanics Patients Undergoing Laparoscopic Cholecystectomy
DOC.detailed_description: In study , 75 ASA I-II patient age 30-65 year randomize 3 group receive 0 cmH2O PEEP ( Group-1 ) , 5 cmH2O PEEP ( Group-2 ) 8 cmH2O PEEP ( Group-3 ) PVC mode . In patient underwent general anesthesia ; hemodynamic parameter , Ppeak , Pplateau , compliance value well Fisevo/Fexpsevo ratio 1 MAC time 1 MAC 0.3 0.1 MAC record . In addition , preoperative postoperative pulmonary function test compare patient .
DOC.criteria: ASA ( American Society Anesthesiologists ) III BMI 2530 patient schedule elective laparoscopic cholecystectomy . Patients ASA III , IV , V risk , Patients comorbid disease may increase intraabdominal pressure pulmonary hypertension , Patients renal hepatic failure , Patients pregnancy Patients use bronchodilator steroid exclude .
